directions.step:
Brown the rice in a nonstick skillet. When golden brown, place in tightly covered casserole. Pour over rice, hot defatted beef broth (mix as per directions on can). Bake in a 350 degree oven for one hour. Garnish with dehydrated parsley. Add more water if needed during cooking.
NOTES : *To remove fat, chill can of beef froth in refrigerator; lift off congealed fat with spoon. Recipe by: 14 Days to New Vigor & Health Mormon Diet
